title: Paul Bloom on Cruelty
description: Yale University psychologist Paul Bloom talks with EconTalk host Russ Roberts about cruelty--what motivates cruelty, the cruelty of small acts that accumulate into something monstrous, and the question of whether the abuse of a robot is a form of cruelty.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (Library of Economics and Liberty)
